citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process starting at 9:49 AM on
10-OCT-2023. The inspector first attempted to make contact at the facility starting at 9:49 am via phone call and text
message to the licensee however there was no reply. A secondary facility contact was reached via phone however this
individual resides in a different state and was not available for inspection. The facility representative stated that they did
attempt to reach the licensee to notify them of our presence however they were also unsuccessful in reaching the
licensee and were not aware of anyone available to facilitate the inspection. After waiting one hour, a final attempt was
made to reach the licensee by phone call and text message however there was no reply. No persons were observed at
the facility while waiting at the outer gate.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process starting at 9:49 AM on 
10-OCT-2023. The inspector first attempted to make contact at the facility starting at 9:49 am via phone call and text 
message to the licensee however there was no reply. A secondary facility contact was reached via phone however this 
individual resides in a different state and was not available for inspection. The facility representative stated that they did 
attempt to reach the licensee to notify them of our presence however they were also unsuccessful in reaching the 
licensee and were not aware of anyone available to facilitate the inspection. After waiting one hour, a final attempt was 
made to reach the licensee by phone call and text message however there was no reply. No persons were observed at 
the facility while waiting at the outer gate. 
 
 
End Section
